content: So every day, when Gran'mama went out to farm, {A豆豆眼}she'd put me in a bamboo basket, and I'd stop cryin' right away. It's because the scent of bamboo reminds me of home.

content: Later, Gran'papa searched every mountaintop for the best bamboo logs and carried them back to build the old house where they lived for decades.
